meanings.sent1: The clown's antics were always chucklesome.

meanings.sent5: The chucklesome cartoon characters made everyone smile.

meanings.definition: A source of laughter or amusement
meanings.sent1: The comedy show was a chucklesome delight.
meanings.sent2: The children's book was full of chucklesome tales.
meanings.sent3: The chucklesome toy made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: His silly hat was a chucklesome sight.
